export var questionObj={"Qtext":"
 
There are 30 members on a student council in a school and the ratio of the number of boys to the number of girls is \(2 : 1 \). How many more girls should be added to the council so that the ratio of number of boys to the girls become \(5 : 7 \).
\newline

","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":0,"step_txt":"Sum of the terms of the ratio is $ = 2 + 1 = 30 $"},{"id":"s2","n_params":0,"step_txt":"So, number of boys in the council is 
\[
	= \frac{5 }{30 } \times 30 = 5 
\] "},{"id":"s3","n_params":0,"step_txt":"So, the number of girls in the council is
\[
	= \frac{7 }{30 } \times 30 = 7 
\]"},{"id":"s4","n_params":0,"step_txt":"Let $x$ be the number of girls that should be added to the student council. Now, number of girls is $ = 7 + x $"},{"id":"s5","n_params":0,"step_txt":"So, according to given information, we can write that
\[
	\frac{5 }{7 + x } = \frac{2 }{1 }
\]"},{"id":"s6","n_params":0,"step_txt":"\[\Rightarrow 14 = 5 + 5 x\]"},{"id":"s7","n_params":0,"step_txt":"\[
	\Rightarrow 14 = 5 x
\]"},{"id":"s8","n_params":0,"step_txt":"\[
	\Rightarrow x = 2.8 
\]
This is the number of girls that needs to be added."}]};export var resp=[{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{Sum of the terms of the ratio is the sum of the two parts of the ratio, i.e., 2 and 1.}$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{We know that the ratio of boys to girls in the council is} 2 : 1. 	ext{Therefore, the fraction of boys in the council is }2 / (1 + 5).$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{The ratio of boys to girls in the council is }2 : 1.	ext{Similarly, the fraction of girls in the council is} 2 / (1 + 7)."},{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{After adding} $x$ 	ext{girls, the total number of girls in the council will be} 7 + $x$.$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{According to the problem, the ratio of boys to girls in the council will remain the same after adding $x$ girls. Therefore, we can set up an equation} \[
	\frac{5 }{7 + x } = \frac{2 }{1 }
\] 	ext{using the ratios before and after adding $x$ girls.}$$"},{"data":[],"text":"Cross-multiplying the fractions and simplifying, we get \[14 = 5 + 5 x\] "},{"data":[],"text":"Subtracting 14 and simplifying the equation, we get \[5 = 14 x
\] "},{"data":[],"text":"$$	ext{Dividing both sides of the equation by 5 and simplifying, we get the value of $x$}.$$"}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
There are 30 members on a student council in a school and the ratio of the number of boys to the number of girls is \(2 : 1 \). How many more girls should be added to the council so that the ratio of number of boys to the girls become \(5 : 7 \).
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Sum of the terms of the ratio is $ = 2 + 1 = 30 $"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "So, number of boys in the council is 
\[
	= \frac{5 }{30 } \times 30 = 5 
\] "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "So, the number of girls in the council is
\[
	= \frac{7 }{30 } \times 30 = 7 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Let $x$ be the number of girls that should be added to the student council. Now, number of girls is $ = 7 + x $"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "So, according to given information, we can write that
\[
	\frac{5 }{7 + x } = \frac{2 }{1 }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[\Rightarrow 14 = 5 + 5 x\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[
	\Rightarrow 14 = 5 x
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[
	\Rightarrow x = 2.8 
\]
This is the number of girls that needs to be added."}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{Sum of the terms of the ratio is the sum of the two parts of the ratio, i.e., 2 and 1.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{We know that the ratio of boys to girls in the council is} 2 : 1. 	ext{Therefore, the fraction of boys in the council is }2 / (1 + 5).$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{The ratio of boys to girls in the council is }2 : 1.	ext{Similarly, the fraction of girls in the council is} 2 / (1 + 7)."}, {"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{After adding} $x$ 	ext{girls, the total number of girls in the council will be} 7 + $x$.$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{According to the problem, the ratio of boys to girls in the council will remain the same after adding $x$ girls. Therefore, we can set up an equation} \[
	\frac{5 }{7 + x } = \frac{2 }{1 }
\] 	ext{using the ratios before and after adding $x$ girls.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "Cross-multiplying the fractions and simplifying, we get \[14 = 5 + 5 x\] "}, {"data": [], "text": "Subtracting 14 and simplifying the equation, we get \[5 = 14 x
\] "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$	ext{Dividing both sides of the equation by 5 and simplifying, we get the value of $x$}.$$"}]
